ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Oh my, Provocation....
ygData.msgSnippet: I would lean to max haste for your level (has max haste scales with level). This would explain why bards with no haste items have reported the song being so
ygData.messageBody:
I would lean to max haste for your level (has max haste scales with level).
This would explain why bards with no haste items have reported the song
being so amazing.

Rokenn

> From: Daryl Schwemley [mailto:drs@...]

> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Oh my, Provocation....
>
>
> The question would be, do they mean max haste in the game or
> just the max
> haste (which may or may not be max haste in the game) that
> the song can
> deliver.
>
> Gilgurth
